package chapter1.step3;

import java.util.Scanner;
import java.text.DecimalFormat;
public class FarheheitToCentigrade {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		DecimalFormat ekinol=new DecimalFormat("#.00");
		Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
		double faren = sc.nextDouble();   //华氏度
        /********** Begin *********/
        double m; 
        m = 5*(faren-32)/9;
        System.out.print("If the Farenheit is "+ faren+",the Centigrade is "+ekinol.format(m)); 
        
		//计算摄氏度
        
        
        //利用DecimalFormat保留摄氏度的两位小数并输出


        /********** End *********/
		
	}
}
